text: The ugly truth we're missing on Trump, Arlington  —  There's an old saying: Never take any time off in 2024.  OK, I just made that up, but no sooner did I decide to skip a few column slots to recover from the joy, or whatever, of Chicago's Democratic National Convention, than all heck broke loose.

Trump appears to have misled Gold Star families on troop deaths in Afghanistan  —  Trump frequently suggests, as he did in a TikTok filmed at Arlington Cemetery, that an 18-month period without hostile-fire deaths took place entirely in his presidency.

How the Media Let Trump Off the Hook for His Arlington National Cemetery Stunt  —  Mainstream outlets downplayed a blatant violation of sacred norms, turning a clear scandal into a partisan dispute.  —  Last week, I wrote about former President Donald Trump's tacky, potentially illegal publicity stunt at Arlington National Cemetery.
